author: Eileen Magnier
title: Clonmany patchworkers doing their bit in time of crisis
description: Eileen Magnier reports from County Donegal on an initiative undertaken by the Clonmany patchwork group in providing masks for many during this coronavirus crisis.
content:
When the word came from government to cocoon, some of the 20 or so members of the Clonmany patchwork group in north Donegal found themselves confined to home.
These women, however, weren't about to sit back and relax, they decided they wanted to do their bit… [+1372 chars]
